Name: Redumption
About the game: Your friends have been transformed into trash! Now it's up to you, as the only one left, to save them. With a little help from the Good Witch of the Woods and her magical broom, sprint across the waste cleaning up trash, fight the evil minions and save your friends. Reclaim lost items and gain power ups to help you on your quest to defeat the Evil Witch of the Waste. Become the hero and save the town from being consumed by junk and debris! Genre: 3d single player action adventure Audience: Recommended for 10 + Platform: Built for PC Features: Open exploration Combat or stealth Level up Controller support
